commit message:
fix(stations): lock access to the list.

Use a lock to synchronize when iterating stations or removing a station.

Close #60.

chore(acra): update acra version.

It should fix an issue occurring only on android 2.3.

Close #68

fix: NPE when getting the connection service

Connection service may be null, relative to #71

feat: display the station number

Name will appear next to the number (%d - %s), relative to #72

feat: add preference to hide the updated at station info

Relative to #75
Minor rework around preferences and methods names

docs: update readme

Change date release format
Add next 3.1.0 release date

Relative to #74

improve: update default stations assets

Relative to #76
